content:
PANORAMSeq: Spatial Transcriptomics Analysis

Unlock Spatial Gene Expression Patterns

PANORAMSeq is a cutting-edge spatial transcriptomics platform that reveals gene expression patterns in their native tissue context. This pipeline processes in-situ array-based sequencing data to provide comprehensive quality control and spatial gene expression profiling.

Key Features

  • Read Quality Control: Comprehensive FastQC analysis of raw sequencing reads

  • Spatial Mapping: Alignment and mapping of reads to spatial coordinates

  • Quality Reporting: Integrated MultiQC reports for comprehensive quality assessment

  • Gene Expression: Spatial gene expression quantification and analysis

  • Visualization Ready: Output formatted for downstream spatial analysis tools

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Quality Control: FastQC assessment of raw reads from spatial arrays

  2. Preprocessing: Read trimming and quality filtering

  3. Spatial Alignment: Mapping reads to spatial coordinates and reference

  4. Expression Quantification: Gene-level expression counting per spatial location

  5. Quality Reporting: MultiQC comprehensive report generation

Sample Sheet Format

Your CSV samplesheet defines the spatial transcriptomics experiment:

sample,fastq_1,fastq_2,spatial_coordinates
spatial_rep1,sample1_R1.fastq.gz,sample1_R2.fastq.gz,coords1.csv
spatial_rep2,sample2_R1.fastq.gz,sample2_R2.fastq.gz,coords2.csv

Expected Results

Spatial Expression Data

  • Gene Expression Matrices: Spatially-resolved gene counts

  • Spatial Coordinates: Mapped expression to tissue locations

  • Quality Metrics: Per-spot and per-gene statistics

Quality Control

  • MultiQC Report: Comprehensive analysis summary

  • FastQC Results: Read quality assessment

  • Mapping Statistics: Spatial alignment metrics

Analysis-Ready Outputs

  • Spatial Objects: Ready for downstream spatial analysis

  • Visualization Files: Spatial expression plots and overlays

  • Count Matrices: Gene expression per spatial location

Perfect for Research in: Tissue architecture • Cancer microenvironment • Developmental biology • Neuroscience • Immunology • Organ development • Disease pathology

Built with Nextflow • Containerized execution • Continuous integration tested
